H0.text: The willow tree belongs to which genus. Alnus

H1.text: The willow tree belongs to which genus. Populus

H2.text: The willow tree belongs to which genus. Betula

H3.text: The willow tree belongs to which genus. Salix

A4.text: Willows, also called sallows and osiers, of the genus Salix, comprise around 350 species

A5.text: The type species, i.e., the species on which the genus name is based, is Salix alba
